TopicTitle: I went on the debug page my sandbox game and now it’s carries over to all my saves

Articles.Content: Hi so was playing Sandbox and enabled low gravity to help me figure out how RCS works so I found out how to do it but now on all my saves it’s low gravity, Does anybody know how to fix this?
Did you disable low gravity on the save you were playing on?

AFAIK the debug menu should only be for the save you put it on, have you submitted a bug report? If not, you can submit one here:

https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/
Did you turn off Low Gravity when you were done testing RCS? If not, go back into the debug menu and try to turn it off.
Hi it was just a glitch because when I turned my PS4 back on it was fixed but thanks for the help anyway
